project_name: Real-Time Chat and Video Calling Application

items.title: Real-Time Text Chat
items.description: Implement a real-time text messaging feature allowing users to send and receive messages instantly.
acceptance_criteria: Messages are delivered to recipients within 1 second under normal network conditions
Users can see when the other party is typing
Messages are displayed in correct chronological order
non_functional: System should handle at least 10,000 concurrent users

items.title: Video Calling Feature
items.description: Enable one-to-one and group video calls with real-time audio and video streaming.
acceptance_criteria: Users can initiate and receive video calls
Video and audio streams have less than 300ms latency
Support for at least 4 participants in a group call
Users can mute/unmute audio and enable/disable video during calls
non_functional: Video quality adapts to network conditions
Secure transmission of audio and video streams

notes: Assumed that the application will support both web and mobile platforms; no specific platform requirements provided.
